alert.note: Alert for Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern San Patricio County through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taft, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern San Patricio County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio
